Verses: 1 ezhaam Maadham Irubaththoraanthedhiyile Aagaai Ennum Theerkkadharisiyin Moolamaai Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaayitru; Avar:

2 nee Seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabel Ennum Yoodhaavin Thalaivanodum, Yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyanodum, Janaththil Meedhiyaanavargalodum Sollavendiyadhu, Ennavendraal:

3 indha Aalayaththin Mundhina Magimaiyaik Kandavargalil Ungalukkulle Meendhirukkiravargal Yaar? Ippozhudhu Idhu Ungalukku Eppadik Kaangiradhu? Adharku Idhu Ungal Paarvaiyil Ondrumillaadhadhupol Kaangiradhallavaa?

4 aanaalum Serubaabele, Thidankol Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyane Nee Thidankol; Dhesaththin Ellaa Janangale, Neengal Thidankollungal, Velaiyai Nadaththungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Ungaludane Irukkiren Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
5 neengal Egipthilirundhu Purappadugirapodhu Naan Ungalode Udanpadikkai Pannina Vaarththaiyinpadiye, En Aaviyaanavarum Ungal Naduvil Nilaikondiruppaar; Bayappadaadheyungal.
6 senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar: Konjakkaalaththukkulle Innum Orudharam Naan Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Vettaandharaiyaiyum Asaiyappannuven.
7 sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Asaiyappannuven, Sagala Jaadhigalaalum Virumbappattavar Varuvaar; Indha Aalayaththai Magimaiyinaal Niraiyappannuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
8 velliyum Ennudaiyadhu, Ponnum Ennudaiyadhu Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 mundhina Aalayaththin Magimaiyaip Paarkkilum, Indhap Pindhina Aalayaththin Magimai Peridhaayirukkum Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar; Ivvidaththile Samaadhaanaththaik Kattalaiyiduven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
10 thariyuvin Irandaam Varusham Onbadhaam Maadham Irubaththunaalaanthedhiyile Aagaai Ennum Theerkkadharisiyin Moolamaaik Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaayitru; Avar:

11 oruvan Than Vasthiraththin Thongalile Parisuththa Maamsaththaikkondupogaiyil Than Vasthiraththin Thongal Appaththaiyaagilum Saadhaththaiyaagilum, Dhraatcharasaththaiyaagilum, Enneyaiyaagilum, Matrendha Pojanapadhaarththaththaiyaagilum Thottaal Adhu Parisuththamaagumo Endru Nee Aasaariyaridaththil Vedha Nyaayaththaippatrik Kel Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
12 adharku Aasaariyargal Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Parisuththamaagaadhu Endraargal.
13 pinaththaal Theettuppattavan Avaigalil Edhaiyaagilum Thottaal, Adhu Theettuppadumo Endru Aagaai Pinnum Kettaan; Adharku Aasaariyargal Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Theettuppadum Endraargal.

14 appozhudhu Aagaai Appadiye Indha Janangalum Indha Jaadhiyaarum En Samugaththil Irukkiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargaludaiya Kaigalin Ellaak Kiriyaigalum Appadiye Irukkiradhu; Avargal Ange Konduvandhu Padaikkiradhum Theettuppattirukkiradhu.
15 ippodhum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattumpadi Oru Kallinmel Oru Kal Vaikkappattadhu Mudhal Nadandhadhai Ungal Manadhile Sindhiththuppaarungal.

16 andha Naatkal Mudhal Oruvan Irubadhu Marakkaalaagak Kanda Ambaaraththinidaththil Vandhapodhu, Paththumarakkaalmaaththiram Irundhadhu; Oruvan Aalaiyin Thottiyil Aimbadhukudam Molla Aalaiyinidaththile Vandhapodhu Irubadhu Kudammaaththiram Irundhadhu.
17 karukkaayinaalum Vishappaniyinaalum Kalmazhaiyinaalum Ungalai Ungal Kaigalin Velaiyilellaam Adiththen; Aanaalum Neengal Ennidaththil Manadhaith Thiruppaamalponeergalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.

18 ippodhum Idharku Mundhina Kaalaththil Nadandhadhai Ungal Manadhile Sindhiththuppaarungal; Onbadhaam Maadham Irubaththunaalaanthedhiyaagiya Innaalmudhal Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Asthibaaram Podappatta Annaalvaraikkum Sendrakaalaththil Nadandhadhai Ungal Manadhile Sindhiththuppaarungal.

19 kalanjiyaththil Innum Vidhaiththaaniyam Undo? Dhraatchachchediyum Aththimaramum Maadhalanchediyum Olivamaramum Kanikodukkavillaiye, Naan Indrumudhal Ungalai Aaseervadhippen Endru Sollugiraar Endraan.
20 irubaththunaalaanthedhiyaagiya Annaalile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Irandaam Visai Aagaai Enbavanukku Undaagi, Avar:
21 nee Yoodhaavin Thalaivanaagiya Serubaabelode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Naan Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Asaiyappanni,

22 raajyangalin Singaasanaththaik Kavizhththu, Jaadhigaludaiya Raajyangalin Belaththai Azhiththu, Radhaththaiyum Adhil Eriyirukkiravargalaiyum Kavizhththuppoduven; Kudhiraigalode Avaigalinmel Eriyiruppavargalum Avaravar Thangal Thangal Sagodharanin Pattayaththinaale Vizhuvaargal.

23 senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar: Seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabel Ennum En Oozhiyakkaarane, Unnai Naan Annaalile Serththukkondu, Unnai Muththirai Modhiramaaga Vaippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Unnaith Therindhukonden Endru Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sollugiraar Endraar.
